title: Lauren Cohan will return to The Walking Dead Season 11
text:
Photo: Noam Galai/Getty Images

Rejoice, fans of The Walking Dead, for the past is not dead, it isn’t even past. Early news of The Walking Dead returning for its eleventh season hit New York Comic Con today before its tenth season debuts this Sunday night. Even more surprising than that, however, was the unexpected return of former star Lauren Cohan as Maggie Greene to the show. Her character has not been on the The Walking Dead since season nine, before the show made a six-year time jump. The news of the renewal as well as Cohan’s return was announced at a panel for The Walking Dead that included series regulars as well as show runner Angela Kang. Check out the beautiful reunion below, and prep yourself for jump scares in the season premiere of The Walking Dead, tomorrow night at 9/8c on AMC.
description: Lauren Cohan revealed at NYC Comic Con that she will return to The Walking Dead Season 11 as fan favorite character Maggie Greene. The character has not been seen since Season 9.
